mapper.select: update INSBRulequeryclaims set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},inscorpid = #{inscorpid},inscorpcode = #{inscorpcode},inscorpname = #{inscorpname},casestarttime = #{casestarttime},caseendtime = #{caseendtime},claimamount = #{claimamount},policyid = #{policyid},risktype = #{risktype} where id = #{id}
SELECT i.*,p.`policyno` FROM insbrulequeryclaims i left JOIN insbpolicyitem p ON i.`policyid` = p.`id` WHERE i.`taskid`=#{taskid}
